bioAsHtml: Arquillian lead and cofounder Aslak Knutsen is a Senior Software Engineer at Red Hat where he is working on projects such as Arquillian and ShrinkWrap, one of the founders of the JBoss Testing initiative and a speaker at major industry conferences including JavaOne, Devoxx, Geecon, DevNation, IBM Impact and Oracle Open World. Java Champion and JavaOne Rockstar.

acceptedTalks.title: The Borg is docking your system; testing is futile! Or is it?

bio: Arquillian lead and cofounder Aslak Knutsen is a Senior Software Engineer at Red Hat where he is working on projects such as Arquillian and ShrinkWrap, one of the founders of the JBoss Testing initiative and a speaker at major industry conferences including JavaOne, Devoxx, Geecon, DevNation, IBM Impact and Oracle Open World. Java Champion and JavaOne Rockstar.
